summary: WHEN I DROVE THE CAR AT AROUND 60 MPH THE STEERING WHEEL SHAKES SIDE TO SIDE AGGRESSIVELY. THE DEALERSHIP CHANGED TWO DRIVE SHAFTS AND CHECKED THE BALANCE OF THE TIRES. AFTER ALL THAT IT STILL SHAKES THE DEALERSHIP SAID IT JUST HOW THE JEEP RIDES NO CAR OR TRUCK I'VE DROVE EVER DID THAT. I THINK ITS A SAFETY DEFECT IN THE STEERING AT HIGH SPEEDS AND ALL I DRIVE IS EXPRESSWAY DRIVING. A NEW VEHICLE SHOULDN'T  DRIVE LIKE THIS.  *TR
